uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.algorithm

Class Arithmetic

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.algorithm.Arithmetic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShAlgorithm

    public class Arithmetic
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShAlgorithm
    Returns an object that can then be used for varies calculations. This class can also be used as static methods, without building an instance for each operations.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • expectedHSPLength

        public static int expectedHSPLength(double minor,
                    int readLength,
                    long totalLength,
                    double pairAlign)
        This method calculates the high-scoring segment pairs (HSP) length.
        Parameters:
        minor - default minor value
        readLength - input length of each sequencing read.
        totalLength - the total sequence length of reference genome.
        pairAlign -
        Returns:
        an integer: the high-scoring segment pairs (HSP) length.

      • effectiveReadLength

        public static int effectiveReadLength(int readLength,
                      int HSP,
                      double minor)
        This method calculates the effective read length for E-value test.
        Parameters:
        readLength - input length of each sequencing read.
        HSP - high-scoring segment pairs (HSP) value calculated based on expectedHSPLength(double, int, long, double) method.
        minor - default minor value.
        Returns:
        an interger: the effective read length.

      • effectiveRefLength

        public static long effectiveRefLength(long totalLength,
                      int HSP,
                      int contigNum,
                      double minor)
        This method calculates the effective reference length for E-value test.
        Parameters:
        totalLength - input total length of reference genome.
        HSP - high-scoring segment pairs (HSP) value calculated based on expectedHSPLength(double, int, long, double) method.
        contigNum - number of contigs or chromosomes in reference genome file.
        minor - default minor value.
        Returns:
        a long: the effective reference length.

      • getEValue

        public static double getEValue(int raw,
               double minor,
               double lambda,
               int readLength,
               long totalLength)
        This method calculates the E-value for each alignment.
        Parameters:
        raw - q-Gram score.
        minor - default minor value.
        lambda - default lambda value.
        readLength - input length of each sequencing read.
        totalLength - input total length of reference genome.
        Returns:
        a double: the E-value.
